name: Lifelink
description:
Connect with the living beings to stop the afterlife phantoms from sucking their energy out of it.

  • A rogue-like game with several randomly chosen rooms between each of your playthroughs.
  • Simple controls! WASD (Move) Left Mouse Button (Attack) Right Mouse Button (Aim)
  • Original soundtrack!
  • Original assets, particles, UI and textures!
  • Original animations and characters!

(There is no SFX though, yet)
